original: teṣāmanārambhakatve kāryadravyasya virodhiguṇākrāntatvaṃ vyagratvamasaṃnidhirvā na heturityuktiphalamāha-

original: yattu kāraṇaguṇaḥ svasamānaguṇārambhaka iti vyāpteḥ sāmānyaguṇeṣu pārimāṇḍalyādiṣu
analyzed: yat tu kāraṇa guṇaḥ sva samāna guṇa ārambhakaḥ iti vyāpteḥ sāmānya guṇeṣu pārimāṇḍalya ādiṣu

original: vyabhicāre 'pi yo dravyasamavāyikāraṇagato viśeṣaguṇaḥ sa svasamānajātīyaguṇārambhaka
analyzed: vyabhicāre pi yaḥ dravya samavāyi kāraṇa gataḥ viśeṣa guṇaḥ sa sva samāna jātīya guṇa ārambhaka
iti vyāpteḥ caitanyasya viśeṣa guṇa tvāt ārambhaka tvam durvāram iti
tat mandam
citra paṭa hetu tantu gateṣu nīla ādi rūpeṣu vijātīya citra rūpa hetuṣu vyabhicārāt caitanyasya ātma tvena guṇa tva abhāvāt ca iti mantavyam
tasmāt cetanā dvijātīya ārambhaḥ yuktaḥ iti sthitam
tatra udāhaṇa antaram āha
saṃyogāt ca iti
nanu cetanam brahma kārya upādāna tvāt dravyam
tat na vilakṣaṇasya upādānam iti prakṛte kiñcid dravyam eva vilakṣaṇa kārya karam udāhartavyam
na saṃyogasya guṇasya udāharaṇam iti śaṅkate

original: guṇāt dravyavaccetanādacetanārambha iti vilakṣaṇārambhakatvāṃśe 'yaṃ dṛṣṭānta iti pariharati-

na iti

etat uktam iti

satyam iti
tasya eva atideśasya iti arthaḥ

original: nāsya prāsaṅgikena pūrvādhikaraṇena saṃgatirapekṣiteti manvānaḥ pradhānasyeśvarānadhiṣṭhitasyākāraṇatve
analyzed: na asya prāsaṅgikena pūrva adhikaraṇena saṃgatiḥ apekṣitā iti manvānaḥ pradhānasya īśvara anadhiṣṭhitasya akāraṇa tve

original: sa kiṃ mānamūlo bhrāntimūlo veti saṃdehe pūrvapakṣayati-
analyzed: sa kim māna mūlaḥ bhrānti mūlaḥ vā iti saṃdehe pūrvapakṣayati
sa ca iti

original: taiḥ paṭādibhiḥ sāmānyaṃ kṣityādeḥ kāryardravyatvaṃ tenetyarthaḥ /
analyzed: taiḥ paṭa ādibhiḥ sāmānyam kṣiti ādeḥ kāryaiḥ dravya tvam tena iti arthaḥ
vimatam sa avayavam kṣiti ādikam sva nyūna parimāṇa saṃyoga saciva aneka dravya ārabdham
kārya dravya tvāt
paṭa ādi vat iti prayogaḥ

nanu etāvatā katham paramāṇu siddhiḥ tatra āha

original: vimataṃ sāvayavatvaṃ pakṣatāvacchedakaṃ yato nivartate sa nyūnaparimāṇasyāpakarṣasya paryantatvenāvasānabhūmitvenāvagataḥ paramāṇurityarthaḥ

yāvat sa avayavam anumāna pravṛtteḥ dvyaṇuka nyūna dryam niravayavam siddhi ati iti bhāvaḥ

tatas iti

original: evaṃ kāṇādamatasya mānamūlatvāttena vedāntasamanvayasya virodhādasiddhiriti pūrvapakṣe phalam /

original: pralaye vibhaktānāṃ paramāṇūnāmanyatarakarmaṇo 'bhayakarmaṇā vā saṃyogo vācyaḥ,
analyzed: pralaye vibhaktānām paramāṇūnām anyatara karmaṇaḥ bhaya karmaṇā vā saṃyogaḥ vācyaḥ
karmaṇaḥ ca nimittam prayatna ādikam dṛṣṭam
yathā prayatna vat ātmaka saṃyogāt deha ceṣṭā
vāyu ādi abhighātāt vṛkṣa ādi calanam
hasta nodana ādiṣu ādi gamanam
tadvat aṇu karmaṇaḥ dṛṣṭam nimittam abhyupagamyate na vā
dvitīye karma anutpattiḥ na ādyaḥ
prayatna ādeḥ sṛṣṭi uttara kālīna tvāt iti ubhayathā api na karma saṃbhavati
atas karma asaṃbhavāt tasya saṃyoga pūrvaka dvyaṇuka ādi sargasya abhāvaḥ iti sūtra arthaḥ

original: sthirasya vegavaddravyasaṃyogāviśeṣo 'bhighātaḥ sa eva calasya nodanamiti bhedaḥ /
analyzed: sthirasya vegavat dravya saṃyoga aviśeṣaḥ bhighātaḥ saḥ eva calasya nodanam iti bhedaḥ

vikalpa puraḥsaram dūṣayati

original: jaḍātmavadaṇorāśrayatvaṃ ki na syāditi matvā vikalpaḥ kṛta iti mantavyam /

original: kāraṇanityatvasya pramāṇāntareṇa jñānaṃ vinā kāryamanityamiti vyavahārayogādityāha-
